Just remember that karma goes around full circle, by buying that product you are contributing to your own fall in income, because eventually you too will be affected by wage cuts because companies need to cut prices to be able to compete with underpriced goods by those willing to exploit their employees for profit.  This leads to a ugly feedback loop, were we all loose in the end and the big monopoly companies are the only winners.  We must take back our power and not support these immoral corporations that only seeks profit.  These companies will soon realize that the power lays with the customers.  This way we all have power to enforce change if we stand together, they can't exploit anyone if they don't have any people to sell there crap too.

not to be that person but a "factoid" is actually not primarily a "small fact" but it's actually a statement that seems like fact but is actually false. https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/factoid

It's been coopted in recent years to be used as a "small fact" and language changes but this channel is all about pedantics like this haha
